All,

I had a few people ask, so figured I'd answer here. Yes, I will entertain *
reasonable* offers.

Thanks... And hope everyone had a great Thanksgiving (or a great Thursday,
if you're not in the USA).

Best,

Andres

On Tue, Nov 18, 2008 at 5:40 AM, Andres Pedraza <apedraza93@...>wrote:

> Dear List,
>
